name: streamifier
description: Converts a Buffer/String to a readable stream
readme: streamifier =========== #### Converts any data type to a Readable stream #### [![NPM version](https://badge.fury.io/js/streamifier.png)](http://badge.fury.io/js/streamifier "Fury Version Badge") [![NPM installation](https://nodei.co/npm/streamifier.png?mini=true)](https://nodei.co/npm/streamifier "NodeICO Badge") #### Functions #### - [_module_.createReadStream(object[, options]) : Readable](#createReadStream) --- ___module_.createReadStream(object[, options]) : Readable__ Returns a Readable stream. The `object` can be of any data type. If it is a Buffer or a string, the available `options` are [`highWaterMark` and `encoding`](http://nodejs.org/api/stream.html#stream_new_stream_readable_options), otherwise the Readable stream is automatically set in [object mode](http://nodejs.org/api/stream.html#stream_object_mode) and the `options` parameter is ignored.
